name: SPASE WIZRAD - A Lost Project
description:
If the brower version lags for you, There is an installer file included below (Requires XBOX Controller).

FOR PC INSTALLER USE XBOX CONTROLLER

or

FOR BROWSER USE:

Movement  - Cursor keys

Shoot - Space bar

In Air Dodge - Z or X

SPASE WIZRAD 

This game represents the results of my first attempt at learning Unity, It has been long since abandoned, but is here a fully realised 5 level demo.

It should offer a solid challenge.

It is a port of a PC game and performance may vary in-browser.
